title: Erie Tools Heavy Duty 24" Sheet Metal Pan and Box Brake with Adjustable Fingers, 16 Gauge
features: Fingers: 1 in., 2 in., 3 in., 8 in., 10 in.
Features removable gauge capacities for use on mild steel or aluminum.
description: Erie Tools Heavy Duty 24" Sheet Metal Pan and Box Brake with Adjustable Fingers, 16 GaugeErie Tools heavy-duty 24-inch pan and box sheet metal brake. This brake will bend sheet metal up to 24-inches wide. Maximum thickness is up to 16-gauge steel and aluminum. Bend angle from 0 to 135 degrees. Includes five (5) fingers for high-precision segment bending, up to 48 inches. Mounts easily to bench top or work surface. Features removable gauge capacities for use on mild steel or aluminum.Heavy-duty pan and box sheet metal brake.Width: 24 in.Bend Angle: 0° to 135°Capacity: 16-Gauge Steel (16-Gauge Aluminum)Fingers: 1 in., 2 in., 3 in., 8 in., 10 in.Features removable gauge capacities for use on mild steel or aluminum.
